meanings.sent1: I love to eat frites with ketchup.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious frites with their burgers.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that he could live on frites alone.
meanings.sent4: The frites were like golden sticks of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked frites filled the air.

meanings.definition: Frites: a dish of fried potato strips served as a side dish or snack
meanings.sent1: She ordered frites as a side dish with her sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The food truck offered frites as a tasty snack option.
meanings.sent3: The frites disappeared from the plate in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The frites were a crunchy delight on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The golden color of the frites was irresistible.
